apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji, presented on Apple devices, depicts a loving couple with a distinct emphasis on connection. The male figure, rendered without specific skin tone variation, stands beside a woman with a warm, medium skin tone, both bathed in Apple's signature soft, realistic lighting. A vibrant, glossy red heart floats between them, a symbol of shared affection and unity, all brought to life with Apple's smooth gradients and rounded, approachable design.
